biotools.summary: dSPRINT is a machine learning framework for predicting DNA, RNA, ion, peptide and small molecule interaction sites within protein domains. The predictor can run on any human Pfam protein domain, and return per-position predictions of interaction-sites for five different ligand types: DNA, RNA, ion, peptide, and small molecule.
